SCRIPT.MSCRI:
!Adding default status if nothing is provided :PSET &SUCCESS_STATUS# = "" :PSET &FAILURE_STATUS# = ""
:IF &UC4RB_TIO_SUCCESS_STATUS# = "" : SET &SUCCESS_STATUS# = "completed" :ELSE : SET &SUCCESS_STATUS# = &UC4RB_TIO_SUCCESS_STATUS# :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TIO_FAIL_STATUS# = "" : SET &FAILURE_STATUS# = "aborted, canceled" :ELSE : SET &FAILURE_STATUS# = &UC4RB_TIO_FAIL_STATUS# :ENDIF
!To check if provided Success status and Failure status are same :DEFINE &SPLITED_SUCCESS_ARRAY#,string,30 :FILL &SPLITED_SUCCESS_ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&SUCCESS_STATUS#,",") :SET &STATUS_COUNT# = LENGTH(&SPLITED_SUCCESS_ARRAY#[],SIZE) :SET &COUNT#=1 :WHILE &COUNT# <= &STATUS_COUNT# : IF "0" NE STR_FIND(&FAILURE_STATUS#,&SPLITED_SUCCESS_ARRAY#[&COUNT#]) : P "ERROR: Job could not be completed successfully as the success status and failure status have some common values." : STOP MSG, 50, "ERROR: sucess status and failure status should not be same." : ENDIF : SET &COUNT#=&COUNT#+1 :ENDWHILE
!setting default retry count as 1 :IF &UC4RB_TIO_RETRY_CNT# = 0 : SET &UC4RB_TIO_RETRY_CNT#=1 :ENDIF
!initial wait :IF &UC4RB_TIO_WAIT_FOR_COMPLETE#="YES" : IF &UC4RB_TIO_INIT_WAIT_TIME# GT 0 : SET &INIT_WAIT_TIME# = MULT(&UC4RB_TIO_INIT_WAIT_TIME#, 60) : P "Initially waiting for [&UC4RB_TIO_INIT_WAIT_TIME#] minutes." : WAIT &INIT_WAIT_TIME# : ENDIF :ENDIF
!Retry with Count :SET &LOOP_COUNT# = 0 :SET &SUCCESS# = 0 :SET &FLAG# = 1 :SET &UC4RB_RETRY_CNT#=&UC4RB_TIO_RETRY_CNT#+1 :WHILE &LOOP_COUNT# <> &UC4RB_RETRY_CNT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_TENABLE_IO.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SCAN_STATUS_WITH_RETRY : If &SUCCESS#=1 : SET &LOOP_COUNT# = &UC4RB_RETRY_CNT# : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_TIO_WAIT_FOR_COMPLETE#="YES" : P "Retry Count : &LOOP_COUNT#" : P "Waiting for &UC4RB_TIO_RETRY_INTRVL# sec" : WAIT &UC4RB_TIO_RETRY_INTRVL# : SET &LOOP_COUNT#=&LOOP_COUNT#+1 : ENDIF : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_TIO_WAIT_FOR_COMPLETE#="NO" : SET &LOOP_COUNT# = &UC4RB_RETRY_CNT# : ENDIF :ENDWHILE
:IF &SUCCESS#=0 : P "ERROR: Job could not be completed successfully within specified time limit." : STOP MSG, 50, "ERROR: Timeout Occurred." :ENDIF :IF &FLAG#=0 : P "ERROR: Job could not be completed successfully as the &SCAN_STATUS# status matches with the given failure status" : STOP MSG, 50, "ERROR: Execution failed as the &SCAN_STATUS# status matches with the given failure status" :ENDIF
